columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_GID
columns.description: The GID for the equipment related to the text template.

columns.name: TEXT_TEMPLATE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the text template related to equipment, The selected template is used with the text override option to populate the remark text.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_DEF_GID
columns.description: The GID of the document that should hold the text.

columns.name: TEXT_OVERRIDE
columns.description: Transactional override for the template on the specific document.
